desc: Danyel Cosmetics and Marli Skin Care are fragrance and dye free, gives full coverage, and stays on all day and are formulated to reduce fine lines and wrinkles. We have been providing professional cosmetics and skin care to salons and spas since 1980!

layout.text: Balmy, ultra-hydrating gloss plumps with sheer color and high-shine, to instantly create the appearance of fuller, softer, more youthful-looking lips. Luscious cardamom and nutmeg-flavored formula works from the inside out, to help diminish the appearance of vertical lines and creases, and regenerate and re-volumize lips. Use Promo Code: SHINE and save 25% on all Lip Plumpers, our new Lipliners & Lipsticks, too!
